amendment.description: Amendment sought to protect private property rights adjacent to or within the boundaries of Federal land acquired by the Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in House Report 106-621 to prevent non-federal landowners, who become neighbors of the federal government resulting from an action authorized under the bill, from having those rights that allow the use and enjoyment of their property diminished.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pombo amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 171 - 253 (Roll no. 165).
